description:
Description
Vita Glow Mask is a plant-based sheet mask designed for a dewy complexion. Crafted from 100% Lyocell fabric, it is thin yet resilient, unfolding effortlessly for optimal essence absorption. A unique ironing technique minimizes fabric pilling, ensuring a smooth application without skin irritation. 
 Benefits:- Brightening effect with Vitamin C rich plant extract- Thin but resilient sheet- 100% Lyocell fabricEffects:It primarily focuses on promoting a radiant and youthful complexion by harnessing the power of vitamin C-rich plant extracts.
How To Use1. After cleansing, place the sheet mask on the face avoiding the lip and eye areas and leave on for 10-15 minutes.2. Remove the mask and pat lightly for better absorption of the remaining essence.

description:
Description


Real Fit Rice Bran Brightening Mask: Helps to nourish dull skin while aiding in supporting a brigher-looking complexion with concentrated grain nutrients. Core ingredients: Rice bran extract, Oatmeal extract, Betaine
Natural Ingredients and Easy Application: Formulated with high-quality, skin-loving extracts to nourish and enhance your complexion, simply leave on your face for 10-20 minutes of relaxation.
Vegan Sheet Material: Made from 100% natural-origin vegan materials, certified eco-friendly for a guilt-free skincare experience.
Hydration Boost: Each mask delivers intense hydration, helping to keep your skin moisturized and refreshed.
Cruelty-Free: Committed to ethical practices, ensuring no animal testing is involved in any product development.
 
How To Use

To use the mask, first cleanse and dry your face. Then, apply the mask and relax for 20-30 minutes. After removing it, gently pat in the remaining essence.
 
Key Ingredients

Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract provides deep nourishments to dull skin to brighten the skin tone.
Oatmeal extract is rich in protein and dietary fiber to turn dull and fatigued skin to clear and lively skin.

description:
Description

A popular addition to VT’s Reedle Shot Vita-light series, this multi-vitamin mask is supercharged with Vitamin C to brighten skin, Vitamin E to boost hydration and 1000ppm niacinamide (Vitamin B3) to improve skin elasticity! Trademarked ingredient MELAZERO®V2 (with loquat tree extract and spearmint extract) further evens out hyperpigmentation and blemishes, while centella asiatica extract synergizes with glutathione and triple hyaluronic acids to give skin a nourished, dewy glow. description:
Description

An elasticity-care collagen mask formulated with low-molecular Fish Collagen and Panthenol to condition skin, while delivering moisture and hydration to skin.
Infused with Niacinamide and Glutathione to restore skin radiance and provide pore care, while defending skin against oxidative damage which often leads to wrinkles.
Further boosts collagen production and reduces fine lines and wrinkles with Bakuchiol and Adenosine.
Made with micro-holes hydrogel that increases skin adhesion and allows effective essence delivery and absorption.
Skin irritation test completed, suitable for sensitive skin.

1. After toning, remove the film on the mask and apply the lower mask around the mouth and the upper mask around the eyes respectively.

description:
Description


Soothe and restore sensitive skin with centella asiatica extract and panthenol for intense calming and hydration.
The cooling hydrogel mask adheres seamlessly to reduce redness, relieve irritation, and reinforce the skin barrier.

description:
Description

The lifting mask tightens and tightens the skin, smoothes the relief and reduces the visibility of wrinkles, improving the skin condition. The fabric template contains 2 additional parts that provide lifting of the lower third of the face and outline the contour. The embossed fabric base is made of elastic material and impregnated with a thick nourishing essence that does not leave a sticky feeling. With the VT Reedle Shot Lifting Mask, deepening wrinkles are stretched tight and sagging skin is pulled up. An elastic diamond pattern sheet gently wraps around the skin and adheres perfectly without bending to care for skin volume and elasticity. It cleans the dull skin with chic lids while delivering active ingredients into the skin. Essence containing elastic care ingredients nourishes frizzy skin and makes it firm.

Attach the lower two wing fabrics one side at a time along the jawline up to the side of the eyes, making sure that the fabric on the cheek area adheres well to the skin.4. After resting for about 10 to 20 minutes, remove the mask sheet and gently pat any remaining essence on the skin to help it absorb.* When attaching the lower two wing fabrics, attach them according to the sheet outline so that they do not adhere to the hairline.

description:
Description​
* 4 Sheets + Special Lifting Band *
[FACE LIFTING SHEET MASK] A firming sheet mask featuring a top and bottom section: the top mask contains NAD+ BIO capsules, while the bottom mask is infused with dissolvable PLA threads, that helps enhance defined jawline and gives radiant, plump skin. The additional lifting band further enhances the lifting effect by tightening and sculpting the face.

Hydrolyzed collagen and adenosine are also added to effectively target wrinkles and enhance skin elasticity.

[CLINICALLY TESTED] Clinically proven to improve 6 types of wrinkles (jawline, buccal fat, smile lines, neck, chin, cheek) in just 4 weeks. Reduces the appearance of enlarged pores and improves facial puffiness overnight after using the product for 8 hours.

[RECOMMENDED FOR] All skin types. Especially for wrinkles and fine lines, loose pores and sagging skin, loss of elasticity and firmness.

[HOW TO USE] 1. Start by unfolding the top mask and aligning the eye holes with your eyes. 2. Align the slit in the middle of the bottom mask with your chin, then lift both ends and hook them over your ears. Adjust the intensity of the lower mask by choosing between the two ear slits. 3. Gently smooth the mask down over the chin area 4. For enhanced lifting, position the lifting band under your chin, gently pull up both sides, and secure them by overlapping at the top of your head. 5. Leave the mask on for at least 20 minutes to optimize radiance and lifting effects.

product_name: PH Solution Cool Tea-Tree Mask 300g (24 Sheets)
description:
Description

PH Solution Cool Tea-Tree - 300g
Experience a refreshing and clarifying treatment with the PH Solution Cool Tea-Tree, formulated to calm and balance oily or acne-prone skin. Infused with tea tree extract, known for its antibacterial and anti-inflammatory properties, this solution helps to control excess oil, minimize breakouts, and soothe irritated skin. Its cooling effect provides instant relief to stressed skin while restoring the skin's natural moisture balance, leaving your complexion feeling fresh, clean, and revitalized.

Ideal for oily, combination, and acne-prone skin, the PH Solution Cool Tea-Tree is designed to deliver a calming and cooling sensation while maintaining skin health.
Key Benefits:
Controls excess oil: Tea tree extract helps to regulate sebum production, making it ideal for oily and acne-prone skin.
Soothes and calms: Reduces redness and irritation while providing a cooling sensation to calm inflamed skin.
Antibacterial properties: Tea tree helps to prevent breakouts by targeting bacteria that cause acne.
Hydrates and refreshes: Balances the skin’s moisture levels without leaving it feeling greasy.
Cooling effect: Instantly refreshes and soothes irritated or overheated skin.

Why You’ll Love It:
Oil control and clarity: Perfect for reducing shine and controlling oil throughout the day.
Refreshing and calming: Leaves your skin feeling cool, calm, and refreshed, ideal for acne-prone or irritated skin.
Lightweight and non-greasy: Absorbs quickly, leaving a matte finish without clogging pores.
 
How To Use
After cleansing, apply a moderate amount of the solution to your face, focusing on areas prone to oiliness or breakouts.
Gently massage into your skin, allowing it to absorb fully.
Follow with your regular moisturizer or sunscreen if using during the day.
Use daily, morning and night, for best results in controlling oil and soothing irritation.
Achieve balanced, clearer skin with the PH Solution Cool Tea-Tree, a refreshing solution designed to control oil, calm irritation, and prevent breakouts for healthier, more radiant skin.

product_name: Mild Acidic PH Sheet Mask Glutathiosome Fit (1ea)
description:
Description


The Abib Mild Acidic pH Sheet Mask Glutathiosome Fit 10ea is a skincare product designed to provide deep hydration and skin-brightening benefits while maintaining the skin's natural pH balance.

The sheet mask is formulated with a mild acidic pH that aligns with the skin's natural pH level, helping to maintain a healthy skin barrier and protect against environmental aggressors.

 This ingredient is likely a combination of glutathione, a powerful antioxidant, and liposomes. 
Glutathione is known for its skin-brightening properties, helping to reduce the appearance of dark spots and improve overall skin tone.

This sheet mask is perfect for those looking to brighten their complexion, improve skin texture, and maintain a healthy, balanced skin environment. 
It’s a great addition to any skincare routine, especially for those concerned with dullness or uneven skin tone.
How To Use

Cleanse face and apply toner to refine the skin texture

Carefully remove mask from packaging, unfold, and place the sheet mask on your face

Apply mask evenly across face, gently smooth the mask to ensure good contact with skin

Leave mask on face for 10 ~ 20 minutes

Remove mask and discard. Pat skin lightly to absorb the remaining essence into the skin.

Immerse your skin in unparalleled deep hydration with the VT Hydrop Reedle Shot 100hL 2-Step Hydrogel Mask. UNMATCHED DEEP HYDRATION – Unlock intense hydration with this dual-step treatment, designed to deliver deep moisture and inner radiance.

How To Use
How to Use:
1. Apply Step 1 Reedle Shot: Dispense the packet and apply evenly to a clean face. Allow it to fully absorb.

2. Apply Step 2 Hydrogel Mask: Remove the backing films and place the mask on your face, smoothing it into place.

3. Remove the Mask: After 20–40 minutes for quick hydration, or 2–3 hours for deep hydration. For intensive hydration, leave it on overnight.

description:
Description

Product Benefit
ID.AZ Face Fit Plaster Mask is an affordable upgrade in-house spa treatment. It cleanses and tightens your pores almost immediately and improves the skin texture. 
Made of real plaster and clay, several patented ingredients like Hyaluronic Acid, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, and Evening Primrose Oil act together to make your skin healthy and glowing with renewed elasticity
Pore : Help improve pores tightening,Help improve pore shrinkage, Help Improve the volme of pores, Helps improve sebum
Lifting : Helps improve facial 3D steroscopic lifting, Helps improve facial full tightening, Helping to improve the elasticity of the multi-dimensional structure, Helps to improve skin tightening
Tone & Texture : Help improve temporary double tone, Helps to improve the consistency of brightness, Helps improve fine skin texture, Help improve skin moisture content
Skin : Helps improve skin circulation, Helps to improve skin swelling, Helps reduce skin temperature

How To Use

1. After washing your face, cleanse your skin with toner.
2. Open the mask sheet and remove the transparent plastic part, match the eyes and nose, attach it to the face, and remove the opaque plastic surface on the other side.
3. Attach the lower part according to the mouth in the same way and wait for the sheet to dry completely for about 20 to 25 minutes.
4. When the sheet is dry, gently remove the upper and lower sheets from the side of the face and wipe off the residue on the skin with a light water wash.
5. If necessary, spread it evenly with ampoule and cream to absorb it

product_name: Cryo Icing Calming Mask Sheet (6 Types)
description:
Description


# Hydrating : Contains hydrangea leaf extract and hyaluronic acid to take care of skin moisture.

# Calming : Contains ice plant extract and adecassoside to soothe and energize the skin.

# Firming : Contains raspberry extract and peptides to make the skin more firm.

# Pore Clearing : Contains cabbage extract and PHA to help constrict pores and keep skin clean.

# Vitalizing : Contains pineapple extract and vitamin C to revitalize dull skin.

# Strengthening : Contains fig extract and ceramide to strengthen the skin barrier.

How To Use

1. After face wash, put on your toner for a clean base.

2. Open the pouch and place the mask on to your face and remove the blue film on the other side.

3. Wait 10~15 minutes and take off the mask.

4. Gently pat in the remaining essence.

description:
Description


- A deeply moisturizing, close-fitting microfiber sheet product.

- Double-layered structure to make panthenol more deeply absorbed into the skin, maximizing its efficacy to moisturize and smooth the skin.

- Contains panthenol, which turns into vitamin B5 when absorbed into the skin, moisturizing and strengthening the barrier.

- Grown in pristine high-altitude regions where the dawn is cool and crisp, Rhynchosia Nulubilis Beans are rich in protein, B vitamins, and other nutrients that deeply moisturize the skin.

- Moisturize and care for your skin more intensively by adding the three essential elements of ceramides, cholesterol, and fatty acids.

- Strong Wrinkle reduction effect. Perfect for anti-aging with hydrating properties form Black Soybean Extract.
How To Use
After cleansing and tidying with toner,
1. Remove mask from pouch and apply unto face evenly.
2. Leave mask on for 20 minutes. After removal, tap gently across face for better absorption of residual essence.
Key Ingredients
Glycerin increases skin hydration, relieves dryness, refreshes the skin's surface, and acts as an emollient to soften the skin, providing a comprehensive solution for achieving a well-nourished and supple complexion.

Glycine Max (Soybean) Seed Extract By balancing skin tone, minimizing the appearance of hyperpigmentation like age spots and sun damage through vitamin E's natural lightening properties and genistein's inhibition of melanin production, leaves your skin with an even complexion.

Panthenol Keeps the skin moisturized can help prevent it from becoming sensitive and easily irritated. Panthenol can also help improve the roughness, dryness, itching, redness, and scaling associated with conditions such as eczema, contact dermatitis, and psoriasis.

description:
Description


DEEP HYDRATION: The oligo-hyaluronic acid found in the Biodance Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask has a moisturizing effect that is superior to that of regular hyaluronic acid. It quickly hydrates the skin's surface and penetrates deeper layers of skin resulting in a healthy and moisturized complexion.
PORE TIGHTENING & FIRMING: Ultra-low molecular collagen maximizes skin penetration and absorption. It refines enlarged pores, improves skin elasticity instantly after application and visibly smooths out the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
STRENGTHEN THE SKIN’S BARRIER: Our hydrogel mask contains 3 different kinds of probiotics that strengthen the skin’s barrier and prevent skin aging.
HYPOALLERGENIC: This deep hydrating facial mask is formulated with non-toxic & non-irritant ingredients. It is free of allergic reaction-causing ingredients and 19 other harsh, controversial ingredients. It is completely safe for sensitive skin.
Biodance skincare products focus on the balance of effective ingredients and long-lasting results beyond temporary effects.

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.content: Biodance Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask – My Honest Review This mask has been a game-changer for my skin! It’s packed with oligo-hyaluronic acid that goes deeper than regular hyaluronic acid, giving me an intense hydration boost that leaves my skin looking plump and healthy. The ultra-low molecular collagen really tightens my pores and firms my skin, making fine lines look smoother after just one use. I also love that it has three different probiotics to strengthen my skin barrier and fight signs of aging. What’s even better? It’s hypoallergenic and made with safe, non-irritating ingredients — perfect for my sensitive skin. The hydrogel texture feels so cooling and soothing, making it a treat to use. My skin always feels firmer, smoother, and perfectly hydrated!

description:
Description

- A daily sheet mask infused with carrot extract rich in beta-carotene to soothe and hydrate the irritated skin.
- Enriched with beta-carotene from carrot seed oil to help boost skin health and soothe irritation.
- Refreshing and moist water-based formulation.
- Soft, eco-friendly, vegan-certified sheets for daily skincare.
- Dermatologist tested for sensitive skin.

How To Use
1. When using for the first time, open the lid by turning it to the left, then remove the film.
2. After cleansing and toning, apply the sheet mask evenly to the entire face and wait for 5 minutes.
3. Remove the sheet and lightly tap the remaining essence to be absorbed into the skin.
Tip. On busy mornings or before makeup, just pull out one sheet of mask and take care of your skin quickly and easily.

description:
Description


- Extracted from clean Wando-grown kelp, comprising 90% of the content.
- Certified by a Korean FDA for improved Pore ​​clarity, density, transparency, skin elasticity (test completed).
With Korean Wando grown Sea Kelp extracted from the ocean, skin is purified and nourished.
- Improved skin elasiticty and hydration with targeted action on pigmentation and redness.
- Long-lasting moisture without stickiness with a thick cotton pad.
- Special care maker that synergizes with all HYAAH products
How To Use

1. Take out three synergy packs and apply them to both cheeks and forehead.
2. Fold the previously applied pack into a crescent shape and place it on another area that feels dry for 5 minutes.
3. Remove the applied pack and gently fold it.
4. Pat the dry areas where the eyes or pack did not touch, allowing it to absorb by gently tapping for 30 seconds in each corner.

product_name: Premium Idebenon Blackberry Complex Ampoule Mask (20ea)
description:
Description
- The Premium Idebenone Blackberry Complex Essence Mask is a daily use, premium anti-aging solution designed to deliver comprehensive skincare benefits. - It preserves the nutrients of five best-selling serums from Marine NMA, offering wrinkle improvement, whitening, antioxidant, soothing, and moisturizing care. - The mask harnesses the powerful antioxidant and anti-aging effects of Idebenone, which is four times more effective than Vitamin C and ten times more potent than Coenzyme Q10. - Combined with the rich antocyanins in Blackberry Complex and the added benefits of Vitamin C, it provides robust antioxidant energy to the skin.- Each mask is conveniently packed in a mini pouch filled with essence, ensuring a single-use application that is both hygienic and environmentally friendly. - The mask itself is made from black bamboo charcoal, which effectively absorbs impurities and delivers deep hydration and nutrients, leaving the skin refreshed and revitalized. - Formulated without 18 harmful ingredients such as parabens, ethanol, mineral oil, phenoxyethanol, synthetic dyes, and allergenic substances, this product is also cruelty-free and has not been tested on animals. - Additionally, it has undergone dermatological testing to ensure it is safe for sensitive skin. - This essence mask offers a comprehensive anti-aging solution with powerful antioxidant benefits, deep hydration, and convenient daily use, making it an essential addition to any skincare routine.

Suggested Use

1. After cleansing, set the face with toner. 
2. Open the lid, open the protective cap, and take out one sheet with the mini tweezer.
3. After 10-15 minutes of letting the essence absorb into the skin, massage the remaining essence lightly to the whole face except around the eye are and lips.

product_name: Collagen Gel Mask Jericho Rose Jelly (1ea)
description:
Description

A vegan collagen face mask approved by V-LABEL in Italy, feel your skin elasticity improve every day.
It has passed the double (inner and outer) layer elasticity improvement, so you can feel the robust skin that is filled in from the deepest layer.
It has passed the skin primary irritation test and the sensitive skin primary irritation test, so those with sensitive skin can improve skin elasticity with no worries.

How To Use
Apply the embossed side to the skin for better adhesion. 
1 After washing and toning the face, remove the mask films on both sides. 
2 Lay the product onto the face, starting centering on the mouth with the bottom half and then centering on the eyes with the top half. 
3 Peel off mask after 20-30 minutes and gently pat the residue on the skin. 
*This gel mask is made from solidified essence and has no supporters, therefore it may tear if pulled or in contact with sharp objects, such as fingernails.

Key Ingredients
Containing 10,005ppm of vegan Collagen Extract, created by fermenting yeast, it enables moisturized and elastic skin.
Palmitoyl Tripeptide-5, a small molecule peptide, boosts collagen and improves skin texture to be smooth and firm.
Made by solidifying a thin layer of essence, the collagen jelly mask will not only provide moisture and a cooling sensation, but also help absorb effective components through the hydrogel sheet adhering seamlessly onto the face.
Can be used on sensitive skin, since no-mesh sheet eliminates the mesh support and minimizes skin stimulation.
Contained in Selaginella lepidophylla, a desert plant that is desiccated but unfurls when exposed to moisture, Trehalose increases moisture content, providing hydration and nutrients to the skin.
The product contains Ceramide, which helps strengthen the skin barrier by preventing moisture loss and filling the skin full of moisture.

description:
Description

This pore-tightening sheet mask with patented ingredients helps control excess sebum and refine pores. A high concentration of birch tree extract deeply hydrates the skin.
100% Vegan, Clean, Natural Ingredients. Returns Guaranteed if Not 100% Satisfied.
How To Use
1. After cleansing, apply toner. 2. Unfold and place a mask on the face, avoiding the eye and lip area. 3. Leave on for 10-20 minutes. 4. Remove mask and gently massage in remaining essence


Key Ingredients
water, betula platyphylla japonica juice, glycerin, butylene glycol, niacinamide, camellia sinensis leaf extract, melaleuca alternifolia (tea tree) leaf extract, 1,2-hexanediol, hydroxyacetophenone, diospyros kaki leaf extract, vitis vinifera (grape) fruit extract, coffea arabica (coffee) seed extract, carthamus tinctorius (safflower) flower extract, polygonum cuspidatum root extract, arginine, carbomer, castanea crenata (chestnut) shell extract, zanthoxylum piperitum fruit extract, betaine, allantoin, hydroxyethylcellulose, panthenol, adenosine, xanthan gum, ethylhexylglycerin, disodium edta, sodium hyaluronate, charcoal powder⠀

description:
Description

Barulab The Clean Vegan Tea Tree Mask minimizes excess sebum, controls oiliness, and minimizes impurities. 
 The formula contains tea tree extract,  licorice root extract, and Artemisia to help those with troubled skin enjoy a sheetmask without any worries.  

How To Use


Remove mask from the package. 
Unfold the sheet mask and place it on your face aligning the holes to your eyes, nose, and mouth. 
Sit back and relax for 15-25 minutes. 
Peel off the mask and discard the sheet mask. 
Gently pat the essence into your face for maximum absorption. 


Key Ingredients

Water, Glicerin, Dipropylene, Glycol, Butylene Glycol, 1.2-Hexanediol, Carboner, Arginine, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Extract (1,000ppm), Allantoin, Coptis Japonica Root Extract, Schizandra Chinensis Fruit Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Xanthan Gum, Ethythexylglycerin, Dissodium EDTA, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristale, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Citrus Tangerina (Tangerine) Peel Oil, Caprylyl Glycol, Artemisia Absinthium Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Juniperus Mexicana Oil, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Lower Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavander) Oil.

description:
Description

Rich in blemish-busting Tea Tree, which replaces water in the formula, the Dr. Ceuracle Tea Tree Purifine Soothing Masks helps to treat trouble and acne-prone skin. Enriched with skin-soothing Gingko Biloba, it also helps to cool, calm and reduce redness caused by stress, sensitivity, and environmental stressors. Crafted from a sheet made from PT cell – 100% natural cellulose extracted from bamboo trees – it’s biodegradable and helps to provide the optimal delivery of active ingredients to the skin. A must in your blemish-busting skincare regime.

Water, Dipropylene Glycol, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Glycereth-26, Butylene Glycol, Paeonia Suffruticosa Root Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, 1,2-Hexanediol, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Carbomer, Trehalose, Panthenol, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Glyceryl Caprylate, Xanthan Gum, Allantoin, Ethylhexylglycerin, Potassium Hydroxide, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Leaf Extract, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Extract(5 ppm), Disodium EDTA, Fragrance.

4. Skin soothing-protection: The 3-calming complex ingredient soothes the skin that has become sensitive to the external environment.

Suggested Use

1. After washing your face, prepare the skin texture with lotion, take out the mask, unfold the folded part, and apply it evenly to the face.
2. After taking a comfortable rest for about 10-20 minutes, remove the mask.
3. Lightly pat the remaining cream on the face for absorption.

description:
Description

- Helps maintain clear and bright skin
- Uses natural moisturizing ingredients such as Eucalyptus and Centella Asiatica
- Soothes the skin and remove sebum and dead skin cells
- Improves the strength and firmness of the skin

Suggested Use

STEP 01 -  

1) After toner, apply ampule generously to the entire face and gently massage in circular motion from the outer to inner areas of the face, avoiding the eye membranous areas. Gently pat in for full absorption.  

STEP 02 -  

2) Remove sheet mask from packaging and gently press mask onto the entire face. 

3) Ensure there are no air bubbles trapped underneath the mask and leave on 10 – 20 minutes. 

4) Remove mask from face and gently pat in for full absorption. No rinsing required. 

* For best results, use mask twice a week and keep masks refrigerated before use.

description:
Description

1.	Collagen: Lifting sheet mask with hydrolyzed collagen restores skin elasticity. It returns softness to the skin and reduces wrinkles. In addition, collagen returns the brightness of the skin tone and nourishes it with vitamins and minerals. Refreshes and restores a healthy radiant complexion. The mask has an ultra thin basis that provides a tight contact with the skin and a better penetration of useful components in sheet mask. 

2.	Hyalronic Acid: Moisturizing sheet mask with hyaluronic acid - a real tsunami for the skin. Suitable for all skin types, it returns elasticity and smoothness to the skin. It helps reduce inflammation, refreshes, softens the skin and reduces wrinkles. The mask has an ultra thin basis that provides a tight contact with the skin and a better penetration of useful components in sheet mask. 

3.	Madecassoside: Anti-inflammatory sheet mask with an extract of centella asiatica (namely, a special molecule madecassoside) effectively combats inflammation and irritation, helps to lighten pigmentation. It refreshes the skin, restores the brightness of the skin tone and reduces excessive greasy shine. The mask has an ultra thin basis that provides a tight contact with the skin and a better penetration of useful components in sheet mask. 

4.	Peptide: Sheet mask with peptides has a pronounced anti-aging effect, which softens the skin, restores its elasticity and reduces wrinkles. In addition, the mask returns the brightness of the skin tone and nourishes it with vitamins and minerals. The mask has an ultra thin basis that provides a tight contact with the skin and a better penetration of useful components in sheet mask. 
 
5.	Vita C: Brightening sheet mask with vitamin C has a brightening effect, returns elasticity to the skin and charges with vitamins. Mask softens skin and refreshes it, and when used regularly works as a gentle peeling. The mask has an ultra thin basis that provides a tight contact with the skin and a better penetration of useful components in sheet mask. 

Suggested Use

After cleansing skin and applying toner, apply to face and wait 10-20 minutes before removing. Gently pat skin to promote absorption of the remaining essence. Avoid contact with eyes and letting sheet mask to dry completely.

reviews.title: CALMS
reviews.content: Honestly? This calming mask lowkey surprised me. I slapped it on after a long day of being everyone’s emotional support human, and it felt like a mini vacation. The serum is thick but not sticky, and it gave my skin that juicy glow after. It didn’t magically erase my stress acne, but it def helped chill out some redness and irritation. Took one star off because the scent was a lil strong—like baby shampoo meets herbal tea—but not a dealbreaker. I’d still buy again just to feel like I have my life together for 20 mins

reviews.title: ✨ This mask gives you that luminous, pearl-like gl…
reviews.content: The Tonymoly Pureness 100 Mask Sheet in Pearl is all about that radiance boost. It’s packed with ingredients that brighten and hydrate, leaving my skin looking fresh and glowing. The sheet is super comfortable, and after using it, my face feels soft, dewy, and radiant. If you're in need of a little glow-up, this mask is the perfect pick to bring some luminosity back to your skin!

The Tonymoly Pureness 100 Mask Sheet in Propolis is my new favorite for when my skin needs some TLC. The propolis gives it that honey-like nourishment, leaving my skin feeling super hydrated and smooth. It’s the perfect mask for calming any irritation and giving your skin that dewy, refreshed glow. After using it, my face feels soft, balanced, and ready to take on the day (or night)!

description:
Description
What it is: An ultra-fine microfiber sheet mask that instantly brightens dull and uneven skintone.
What it is formulated to do: This silky, hydrating microfiber sheet mask-made of soft microfiber finer than a strand of hair-luxuriously delivers essential ingredients for the ultimate brightening benefits. Featuring a super silky texture, the thin material of the mask gently clings to skin for even and consistent absorption of active ingredients.
Glutathione, a potent antioxidant, visibly evens out skintone and helps brighten and improve the appearance of dark spots and discoloration. A dynamic duo of proven skin-brightening ingredients, niacinamide and α-bisabolol, create youthful-looking radiance.•What it is formulated WITHOUT: - Parabens - Sulfates - Phthalates


Suggested Use

Remove film and apply mask over cleansed face.
Leave on for 15 to 30 minutes then remove gently. 
Do not rinse.
Massage remaining serum into skin and follow with moisturizer.

Ingredients

Water, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Dipropylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Trehalose, Stearic Acid, Allantoin, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Calcium Pantothenate, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Pyridoxine HCl, Maltodextrin, Sodium Starch Octenylsuccinate, Silica, Glutathione, Bisabolol, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Glyceryl Stearate, Polysorbate 60, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Carbomer, Triethanolamine, Disodium EDTA, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol.

description: Description  Made of fine cellulose fiber, the lightweight, transparent mask allows pores to fully absorb essential nutrients and moisturizing ingredients for an ultimate hydration therapy. It immediately soothes skin stress and prevents hydration loss.
